miic3.utils.datatype.Series¶

class miic3.utils.datatype.Series(start=0, delta=1, length=0, header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>)[source]¶

Series of equidistant values of the same type (physical quantity)

This could be the time series of daily power consumption.

Note

To generate a time series use a datetime.datetime object for start and a datetime.timedelta object for ‘delta’.

Parameters

  • start (numeric) – first value of the series

  • delta (numeric) – increment of values in the series

  • length (int) – number of values in the series

  • header (Header) – meta informatiom of the quantity

__init__(start=0, delta=1, length=0, header=<miic3.utils.datatype.Header object>)[source]¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Initialize self.

Return a copy of the object

Return a single value from the series as a Scalar object

Return the sequence of values as Sequence object
